---
title: "Scrapping of tables from the Government portal"
---


##### Loading Required Packages
```{r }
library(rvest)     #web scrap the the web
library(tidyverse) # provides several avenues for data wrangling
library(RSelenium) #activates selenium server
library(netstat)   # finding unused ports
library(data.table)#for the rbinding list functions
```

##### Obtaining the YELP url to initialize the Web scraping process.
```{r}
url="https://salaries.texastribune.org/search/?q=department+of+safety"
page<-read_html(url) #creating the page 
```
